A tender visitation and friendly exhortation to all the children of truth to be valiant in this day of trial Brend, William, d. 1676.

s.n., [London? : 1664?]
Caption title. Signed: William Brend, from Newgate, London, the 20 of the 11 month, 1664. Reproduction of original in the Christ Church, Oxford, England.
